Data
Class Station

java.lang.Object
  Data.Station

public class Station
extends java.lang.Object

The Station data structure; Our own custom data structure used to hold the Station data.

Constructor Summary

Station

public Station(java.lang.String stationId,
               Constants.LINE_COLOR_SELECTOR line,
               boolean isTransfer)
Creates Station based on StopID, color of the line, and if it is a transfer stop.

Parameters:
stationId - The StopID of the station.
line - The color of the line.
isTransfer - If this station is a transfer stop.

Station

public Station(java.lang.String stationId,
               Constants.LINE_COLOR_SELECTOR line,
               int positionId)
Creates Station based on StopID, color of the line, and the position of the stop relative to the last stop Position is determined by direction; e.g. On Orange line: heading to Oak Grove or heading to Forest Hills.

Parameters:
stationId - The StopID of the station.
line - The color of the line.
positionId - The number of stops this stop is away from the last stop.

Station

public Station(java.lang.String stationId,
               Constants.LINE_COLOR_SELECTOR line,
               int positionId,
               boolean isTransfer)
Creates Station based on StopID, color of the line, the position of the stop relative to the last stop on the line, and if it is a transfer stop.

Parameters:
stationId - The StopID of the station.
line - The color of the line.
positionId - The position of the stop relative to the last stop.
isTransfer - If this stop is a transfer station
